analysis: The documents primarily concern amendments, regulations, and orders related to military and veteran affairs. They cover topics such as military justice, enlisted men grades and ratings, selective service, reserve components, disability pensions, and the organization of the Veterans' Administration. Many documents delegate authority to specific departments or individuals. There is a focus on adjusting regulations and procedures to address specific needs or changing circumstances within the military and veteran systems.
title: Military and Veteran Regulation Adjustments
